mdRecord.dcterms:title: Homeopathic medicine set
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:medium: wood (plant material); glass (material); cork (bark); paper (fiber product) [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Set includes 100+ small bottles, most with stoppers; several bottles are from from Dr. Henning's Homeopathic Pharmacy of Wheeling, W.VA.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical instruments or apparatus--Homeopathic pharmacy
